amendment.description: To require an assessment of the impact and feasibility of restricting gifts and grants to United States institutions of higher education from entities on the Non-SDN Chinese Military-Industrial Complex Companies List.

vote.text: Amendment SA 944 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 944 proposed by Senator Scott SC to Amendment SA 935. (consideration: CR S3719) To require an assessment of the impact and feasibility of restricting gifts and grants to United States institutions of higher education from entities on the Non-SDN Chinese Military-Industrial Complex Companies List.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 944 proposed by Senator Scott SC to Amendment SA 935.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 944 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
